turns.content: List of sites offering affiliate programs in the crypto industry

There are several websites that offer affiliate programs in the cryptocurrency industry. Here are some of the most popular ones:

1. Binance: Binance is one of the largest cryptocurrency exchanges in the world and offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin or Binance Coin (BNB).
2. Coinbase: Coinbase is a popular cryptocurrency exchange that also offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
3. BitMEX: BitMEX is a cryptocurrency derivatives exchange that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
4. LocalBitcoins: LocalBitcoins is a peer-to-peer Bitcoin exchange that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
5. Paxful: Paxful is another peer-to-peer Bitcoin exchange that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
6. Ledger: Ledger is a hardware wallet manufacturer that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
7. Trezor: Trezor is another hardware wallet manufacturer that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
8. Crypto.com: Crypto.com is a cryptocurrency exchange and payment platform that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin, Ethereum, and its own cryptocurrency, CRO.
9. eToro: eToro is a social trading platform that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin, Ethereum, or fiat currency.
10. Bitfinex: Bitfinex is a cryptocurrency exchange that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin or fiat currency.

Note that these are just some of the many websites that offer affiliate programs in the crypto industry. Be sure to do your own research and carefully read the terms and conditions of each program before signing up.

Sure, here are 20 more websites that offer affiliate programs in the cryptocurrency industry:

1. Kraken: Kraken is a popular cryptocurrency exchange that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
2. KuCoin: KuCoin is a cryptocurrency exchange that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin and its own cryptocurrency, KCS.
3. Bitpanda: Bitpanda is a cryptocurrency exchange and brokerage service that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies.
4. Coinmama: Coinmama is a cryptocurrency brokerage service that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
5. Gemini: Gemini is a cryptocurrency exchange that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
6. BlockFi: BlockFi is a cryptocurrency lending platform that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
7. Celsius: Celsius is a cryptocurrency lending and borrowing platform that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
8. Nexo: Nexo is a cryptocurrency lending and borrowing platform that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
9. Bitbond: Bitbond is a peer-to-peer Bitcoin lending platform that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
10. CryptoHopper: CryptoHopper is a cryptocurrency trading bot that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
11. BitIRA: BitIRA is a cryptocurrency IRA service that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
12. CoinTracking: CoinTracking is a cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax reporting service that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
13. Cryptohopper: Cryptohopper is a cryptocurrency trading bot that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
14. PrimeXBT: PrimeXBT is a cryptocurrency trading platform that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
15. Bityard: Bityard is a cryptocurrency trading platform that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
16. OKEx: OKEx is a cryptocurrency exchange that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
17. BitForex: BitForex is a cryptocurrency exchange that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
18. Huobi: Huobi is a cryptocurrency exchange that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin and its own cryptocurrency, HT.
19. BitMax: BitMax is a cryptocurrency exchange that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin.
20. BitMart: BitMart is a cryptocurrency exchange that offers an affiliate program that pays commissions in Bitcoin and its own cryptocurrency, BMX.

Again, be sure to do your own research and carefully read the terms and conditions of each program before signing up.
